entries.original: Added **"THE BOULDER NEVER STOPS"** philosophy to all system prompts
entries.translated: 모든 시스템 프롬프트에 **"THE BOULDER NEVER STOPS"** 철학 추가

entries.original: Implemented exact continuation message from oh-my-opencode:
**`/ultrawork`** - Now includes "THE ULTRAWORK OATH" and mandatory completion gate
entries.translated: **`/ultrawork`** - 이제 "THE ULTRAWORK OATH"와 필수 완료 게이트 포함

entries.original: **`/sisyphus`** - Added intent gating and delegation specification requirements
entries.translated: **`/sisyphus`** - 의도 게이팅 및 위임 명세 요구사항 추가

entries.original: **`/ralph-loop`** - Now describes as "INESCAPABLE" with "THE RALPH OATH" and sacred promise mechanism
entries.translated: **`/ralph-loop`** - 이제 "INESCAPABLE"로 설명되며 "THE RALPH OATH"와 신성한 약속 메커니즘 포함
